A comparison of results computed with 1. order CCD equations and MBPT 2. order. These should be equal by construct. Benchmark for CCD Naive.
The system consist of 4 shells, and 4 hole states. 
I have used 201values of g, equally spaced, ranging from -1 to 1
Below are the reference energy and calculated correlation energies in following order
g, Reference energy, Naive CCD 1. order, MBPT 2. order
-1 3 -0.291667 -0.291667
